Moving to JDT UI for comment

Khaled,

do you have steps to reproduce ? This works for me launching plug-in tests.
Markus, can you please have a look.

Khaled, it looks like junit.framework.TestCase is not on the classpath. Check
that your plug-in test project's plugin.xml requires plugin org.junit.

We could try to improve the error message in this case.

I realized a bit later that I was trying to launch the wrong plugin (it didn't
have any tests nor did it depend on org.junit).  The error message should
definitely be more user friendly :)
